title: Mission Impossible
plot: Ethan Hunt, an American special agent, struggles to prove his innocence and catch the real culprit when he is falsely accused of murdering his entire team.

title: Obsessed
plot: An asset manager leads a happy and stress-free life with his wife. Things take a turn when his colleague starts stalking him, threatening to ruin his career graph.

title: Maleficent
plot: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan. Soon, she places a curse on his daughter, Aurora, in order to exact revenge.
